channel.title: 🏢 University of Stuttgart on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Stuttgart on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Consistency Models for Scalable and Fast Simulation-Based Inference
item.description: CMPE: a new conditional sampler for SBI, achieves fast few-shot inference with an unconstrained architecture, outperforming current state-of-the-art algorithms on various benchmarks.

item.title: Constrained Sampling with Primal-Dual Langevin Monte Carlo
item.description: Constrained sampling made easy! Primal-Dual Langevin Monte Carlo efficiently samples from complex probability distributions while satisfying statistical constraints.
